statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{12 \, x^{3} - 8 \, x^{2} + 6 \, x - 8 , -54 \, x^{3} + 47 \, x^{2} - 30 \, x + 35 , -6 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} - 3 \, x + 4 , 2 \, x^{3} - 5 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x - 1 , 12 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x - 9\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
